documentation.text: @dev The constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

 @param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.details: The contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control whitch simplifies the implementation of user permissions. This contract is based on the source code at: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol

OwnershipTransferred(address,address).details: An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner.
params.previousOwner: The address of the previous owner.

constructor.details: The constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
